body:
So Riot is implementing the Alpha Client permanently in Season 7 and taking away the option to 'switch to legacy client'. Could we please keep the legacy client as an alternative. The Alpha client is bad for people like I who don't have the best computers, it's laggy and slow and just doesn't work efficiently with my PC Specifications. Please up vote this board post if you'd like to see an alternative for the legacy client in 2017 and let's see if Riot will look into something for us! Thanks for your time :) Sign the petition here!

https://www.change.org/p/riot-games-keep-the-legacy-client-in-season-7?recruiter=645177953&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink
https://www.change.org/p/riot-games-keep-the-legacy-client-in-season-7?recruiter=645177953&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink

replies.body:
Can everyone please remember the client is still in **beta**. It's not optimised yet for slow end computers, this is why the legacy client is still available. 

Complaining that the client is not optimised before it's been optimised is unfair. Features for running the new client on low end PCs, like [potato mode](http://i.imgur.com/mo04KMy.png?1), are still to come.
Not a fan of Beta client
I agree and I will sign the petition, but FYI they are implementing a potato mode in the new client so that not-so-good computers can run efficiently.
